products.title: Bengal Tiger Velour Twilight Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Bengal tiger velour twilight roman blind in blue/green. Made to measure from 23.65 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Bring the indian jungle home with their stylish, plush-feel bengal tiger velour twilight roman blind. This deep night-blue fabric, uses luscious green shaded foliage to frame the beautiful, stalking bengal tiger. A firm favourite with their interior designer team this year, immortalise this famous tiger on this luxury velveteen velour roman blind for years to come. 
 
At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this roman blind comes with their free five year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching curtain!

products.title: Woodland, Twilight - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Woodland, twilight - roller blind when you take a closer look at woodland twilight you soon come to appreciate that it has far more to offer than one of this season's must-have colours. Everything about the subtlety of the texture has been designed to add
products.productdescription: When you take a closer look at woodland twilight you soon come to appreciate that it has far more to offer than one of this season's must-have colours. Everything about the subtlety of the texture has been designed to add depth and clarity to your decor like never before. The best way to match to twilight is to focus on texture before you think about colour. Rubbing down your wooden floor and lightly staining it will add more character than laying laminate flooring. As will choosing an antique style cracked leather couch over something smooth and sleek.
